# `SendMessageBody` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| message | `string` | Yes | The body of the message |
| mentions | `string[]` | No | user ids to be notified |
| threadId | `string` | No | The thread id of the message |
